replies.body:

Long live Sejuani!

But... how could such a strong and powerful woman *not* love such a fabulous and majestic mustache?
{{champion:113}}: First the Freljord, then the male consorts!
but brolaf
we have a talking bear, that's sort of like a Braum right .__.
nope

Cannot compare to Braum's manliness and strength. Even with a boar.

Herehere

AYE!
ashe is the queen ...

Ashe{{champion:22}}, Sejuani{{champion:113}}, and Lissandra{{champion:127}}  are the leaders of three opposing factions in the Freljord.

The easy ways to describe them are:
{{champion:22}} The one who wants peace
{{champion:113}} The ruthless one
{{champion:127}} The evil one

{{champion:113}} Is the closest to evil. She declared war over her wounded pride at being offered food.

{{champion:127}} From what we know, the watchers weren't that bad (if a tad controlling, but you would be to if your underlings wanted to take over the world) although Lissandra has an unhealthy obsession with restoring the long dead past.

Sejuani is more lawful neutral as she sticks to freljord tradition and hates the idea of her sacrifices in life being for nothing. She's kinda like the Noxus of the Freljord. 

Lissandra is similar in wanting to keep tradition, but she's interpreted as evil because this tradition involves "totally fine" slavery and freezing the rest of the world. 

Lissandra thinks that her way will make people happy because they don't understand what an honor it is to be under the watchers. 

Sejuani believes her way will keep the Freljord strong, and while she is right it's a bit dangerous in a changing world. 

Ashe believes that her way will keep her people safe in the future. But she needs to remember that the rest of the world isn't ready for peaceful solutions. Not the Ashe isn't willing to fight. 

Ashe is probably more morally right, I just like Sejuani.

i can kinda understand sejuani's reasoning, the idea of not earning something yourself and just take hand outs can be a great offense in some places. That is why. Sejuani's tribe is about the survival of the fittest, if they can't do it themselves there dead weight wasting precious resources. However with a starving tribe, idk how sejuani keeps bristle in top physical shape, ik she pokes and eating enemies but idk if that is entirely true or not.
She's not Sejuani's queen.
I think you misspelled lissandra

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3fv4jiKv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-28T16:23:52.386+0000)
>
> Lies. No one is better than the true queen of the Freljord. 
> 
> Long live Sejuani!

No. Queen of the Freljord is the queen of the jungle, and that's Ashe.

i.imgur.com/r7alK4t.png
All I saw was why {{champion:113}} is better than {{champion:22}}. I'd like to see Ashe walk around in what is essentially a leather and fur bikini... ! O.O ! ... **pool party Ashe 2016**
Have you seen what Ashe is wearing >.>
Too much is what she's wearing ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH TRADITIONAL SEJUANI!

LONG LIVE THE ORIGINAL BIKINI BABE!
No, but Traditional Bristle is _uuugly_. Also, the joke animation is borked.
you forgot the next panel where sej beats ashe to death. with her fists. and then feeds her corpse to her boar.
No I didn't, what I forgot to put was how Sej finally admits how inferior she is to Ashe

let's be real here, when they are both unarmed, and while in neutral territory, at close range sej would kick ashes face in seventy ways from sunday. 

also, none of the freljord queens could actually run the freljord.

ashe is weak, her peaceful mindset would get freljord attacked and conquered by noxus. imagine ionia without all the hyper skilled ionian warriors.

Sej is strong, but with a full kingdom to run and no desire for simple lifestyles to work, there would be peasant revolts and food shortages for her entire rule, until she was usurped.

Liss is smart, but with her rule of terror and the evil watchers behind her, her rule would be short. I imagine that trundle is aching at a chance to murder liss, he is only with her out of fear, and he is also her only real ally.

honestly if sej and ashe could just put aside their differences and work together, and probably destroy liss and send her into the abyss, that would probably be the only good ending for the freljord.
You say that but Ashe had been kicking Noxian ass long before Sejuani even came into the picture

sej has been in the picture for the whole time, and ashe is not capable of that, her rule is shaky, but her people love her. and she has never seen the full power of a noxian war effort. heck I don't think you're allowed to say noxus would be incapable, you are a riven main aren't you, you know how powerful and deceitful noxus is, and how far from their morals they are willing to go to assure victory.

and i didn't want to do this. but you are making me pull something out that i didn't want to.

http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215203755/leagueoflegends/images/archive/9/97/20100202203711!Ashe_OriginalSkin_old.jpg

you think there is dirt on sej because sej used to wear a bikini? ashe had her entire body surgically altered.
But but but do not confuse mercy for weakness

Well apparently Lissandra was able to corrupt the most good and noble tribe in Frejlord after many centuries, so I'm sure she'll be fine. Currently she seems to be waiting for the watchers to rise again, which probably won't ever happen, so the rest of the Frejlord should be safe from her.

{{champion:113}} "Armored with absolute faith in her destiny, Sejuani pushed herself to extremes that would have killed anyone without her will to endure. She walked into blizzards without food or furs and trained while frigid winds raked her flesh. She clashed with the strongest warriors of her tribe, one after another, until her legs gave out beneath her"

{{champion:22}} Has a magic bow


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Or longer version: {{champion:22}} "The assassins struck while Ashe was on a routine hunt, but their plan was interrupted by the warning cry of a great hawk. Ashe looked back to see her tribesmen approaching with swords drawn. Outnumbered and overwhelmed, Ashe ran for hours"

Ran away, got lead to and given a magic bow. Oh and her power to use it comes from her ancestor/ blood/ luck of the draw. Like a spoiled rich kid.

No what it does it makes her the chosen one, you know like Thor, and Luke Skywalker

And the Bow doesn't have auto Aim, Ashe is ace shot.

>
> No what it does it makes her the chosen one, you know like Thor, and Luke Skywalker
> 
> And the Bow doesn't have auto Aim, Ashe is ace shot.

And both of those characters are lame. Have you seen Ashe shoot? She often sprays out multiple arrows at once making aiming less important. And who knows maybe with the bow and her blood she was born a natural with the bow.
Do you know how hard it is shoot multiply arrows? Magic bow or not that is a lot of arrows to fire.
It does so magically. After all you don't see her put multiple arrows on it, nor pull back and fire like five times. She just pulls back and fires one arrow and it magically splits into many.
Which form around her fingers that are made of solid Ice and in which she needs the strength to be able to keep the weight of said Ice arrows pulled backed until she fires.
